Package org.cibseven.spin.impl.xml.dom

Class DomXmlElement

java.lang.Object
org.cibseven.spin.Spin<T>
org.cibseven.spin.xml.SpinXmlNode<SpinXmlElement>
org.cibseven.spin.xml.SpinXmlElement
org.cibseven.spin.impl.xml.dom.DomXmlElement
public class DomXmlElement extends SpinXmlElement
Wrapper for an xml dom element.

Sebastian Menski
